titleStmt.title: The Observator defended in a modest reply to the late Animadversions upon those notes the Observator published upon the seven doctrines and positions which the King by way of recapitulation layes open so offensive.
Animadversions animadverted.
titleStmt.author: Parker, Henry, 1604-1652.

notesStmt.note: Also published in the same year as: Animadversions animadverted.
Date and place of publication from Wing.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Animadversions animadverted, or" at head of title; "Aug: 26 1642".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
